questions.question: This show established the trope "jumping the shark" after they refused to listen to common sense and be cancelled.
This show established the trope "growing the beard" after one of the main characters grew a beard, after which ratings improved.
This show established the trope "epileptic trees" after one fan's unlikely explanation of an unexplained phenomenon shown in the show.
This series established the trope "for me it was Tuesday" after a villain downplays the significance of killing someone's father.
This movie established the trope "fridge logic" when Alfred Hitchcock was asked about a continuity error.
